title: New: M.I.A. – XXXO
body:
This one’s ones hot off the press folks! Earlier today, BBC Radio 1 named **M.**

**I.A’s** new tune _‘XXXO’_ as the ‘Hottest record in the world’. Quite a claim; but my god when you give it a listen you’ll know exactly why. I’ll say no more.

**M.I.A.’s** as-yet untitled new album comes out June 29 on **N.E.E.T./Interscope.**

[Download M.I.A-XXXO](http://usershare.net/pw1bz3tgquz8)

[Check Out Her Official Site](http://www.miauk.com/)
